OOC:( ANd for being a nature buff, owls fly silently.  You may be 
able to smell her, but not hear her.)

::Shadow Wing::


She heard the echo from his howl and knew she wasn't too far behind.  
She swooped down and perched high up in the branches of a tall Pine 
tree.  She looked around.  She used her telescopic vision to see his 
paw prints on the forest floor.  She took flight again and followed 
the paw prints.  The led to the entrance of a cave. She grinned and 
perched on a Spruce tree branch.  She waited for him to come out.  
For while she saw his prints, she also saw the prints of a bear 
leading into the same cave. She grinned and waited.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine stood near the cave opening looking back. shadow wing was 
> to far away to see but he did smell her. quickly he circled around. 
> she was within a couple miles of him, he smelled the sweet scent of 
> her feathers, he thought he could hear the whistleing wind as she 
> beat her wings. she'd continued north where he turned off."To the 
pit 
> with the caves,"He looked to the sky and in his deepest most 
vibrant 
> voice did something he hadn't done since joining the Maximals.
> 
> HOOOOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWWWWLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL
> 
> 
> His voice echoed, his mech fluid boiled, at last there was hunter 
and 
> prey, he didn't know at the moment which he was, he just knew that 
> once shadow wing heard his cry of the wild, she'd know that she'd 
> just become the prey.
